Package besLib.dsa

Class BesDsa_OS_Func

  • java.lang.Object
    • besLib.dsa.BesDsa_OS_Func
  • public class BesDsa_OS_Func
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to generate OS functional test SSF file in Project
    Version:
    V1.0
    Author:
    Ronnie Li

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BesDsa_OS_Func​(xoc.dsa.IDeviceSetup deviceSetup, xoc.dta.measurement.ILocalMeasurement measurement)
      Constructor
      Generate OS functional test SSF.
      Call the functions in the following order:
      [1] setPinGroup
      [2] removePin
      [3] addWaitCycle
      [4] genWalkingZPattern
      [5] genOperatingSequence

      Generate OS functional test operating sequence.

      Generate walking z pattern in DSA path.
      java.lang.String getPinGroup()

      Remove single pin from pin group.
      BesDsa_OS_Func setPinGroup​(xoc.dta.ITestContext context, java.lang.String spec, java.lang.String pinGroupName)
      Set signal group name which is defined in the specification and remove disabled pins in current dbd file.

        public BesDsa_OS_Func​(xoc.dsa.IDeviceSetup deviceSetup,

        Constructor
        Generate OS functional test SSF.
        Call the functions in the following order:
        [1] setPinGroup
        [2] removePin
        [3] addWaitCycle
        [4] genWalkingZPattern
        [5] genOperatingSequence
        Parameters:
        deviceSetup - An instance of IDeviceSetup interface.

    • Method Detail

      • setPinGroup

        public BesDsa_OS_Func setPinGroup​(xoc.dta.ITestContext context,
                                  java.lang.String spec,
                                  java.lang.String pinGroupName)
        Set signal group name which is defined in the specification and remove disabled pins in current dbd file.
        Parameters:
        context - This instance enables you to access the test context of a measurement.
        spec - The fully qualified name of the specification file.
        pinGroupName - The name of the signal group, as defined in the specification.
        Returns:
        object of BesDsa_OS_Func.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

                                   int waitCycle)
        Pin name and wait cycles data collection.
        Parameters:
        pinName - The single pin name which need wait cycles before M.
        waitCycle - The number of wait cycles.
        Returns:
        object of BesDsa_OS_Func.
